description:
Dan seemed a little on the "curious" side when I first met him.

As I got to know him a little more, he confessed that he had "thought" about certain things and had even gone so far as to stick his own finger up his ass.

Now, Randy likes them big and muscular and Dan fits the bill. I could tell Randy liked Dan right off the bat.

Randy describes himself as "oral" and proved as much while working over Dan's cock.

Once the fucking got going — well, it turns out that Dan is a very vocal bottom!

You might have to turn down your speakers for this one!
title: Dan & Randy
